channel.description: Recent content in task-parallelism on TWH @ Utah

item.title: Cpp-Taskflow
item.description: A fast C++ header-only library to help you quickly write parallel programs with complex task dependencies The Era of Parallel Computing The evolution of computer architectures is moving toward multicore designs. It is common to find multiprocessor systems in today’s electronic products such as mobiles, laptops, desktops, and servers. In order to keep up with the performance scaling, it is becoming necessary for software developers to write parallel programs that utilize the number of available cores.
